name: Chess Position Visualizer
description: Generate a PNG image of a chess position from FEN notation with optional last move highlighting
author: Example

fen.description: FEN string representing the chess position

last_move_uci.description: Optional UCI format move to highlight (e.g. 'e2e4')

output_filename.description: Optional filename for the output PNG image (default: chess_position.png)

image_path.description: Path to the generated PNG image file
